approveWithdrawRequest.subject: Withdrawal Request Status Updates ${status}
approveWithdrawRequest.html:
Congratulations ${fullName},


Your Withdrawal Request of ${amount} coin requested on ${createdOn} is approved by admin of Photo Gallery Affiliate Marketing on ${actionPerformedOn}.


Your Available Coins in Wallet is ${availableCoins}.

rejectWithdrawRequest.subject: Withdrawal Request Status Updates ${status}
rejectWithdrawRequest.html:
Sorry ${fullName},


Your Withdrawal Request of ${amount} coin requested on ${createdOn} is rejected by admin of Photo Gallery Affiliate Marketing on ${actionPerformedOn}.


Reason for Rejection of Withdrawal Request : ${description}.
